objective.overview: Define severity-specific behaviors for produced results!
Message on Run Start giving: Run NR, SID, Detectors in, (*)Feds in per detector
Message on Run Stop giving: Run Nr, SID, Detectors in, (*)Feds in per detector, avg L1 rate, avg stream A rate, avg dead time (from trigger LAS), duration

objective.overview: Message on L1 trigger rate jump > 10%

objective.overview: Message on subsys going to {ERROR, RUNNING_DEGRADED, RUNNING_SOFT_ERROR_DETECTED, PAUSING, PAUSED, RESUMING}
Message on any state change of DAQ

FED dead-time > 1%

objective.overview: Backpressure > 1%
Message on stream A > 500 Hz
objective.notes: Simplified, does not satisfy: after 10 seconds, repeat message every 10 seconds

objective.overview: Check Bx alignment and print message if not aligned repeat after 10 seconds
objective.notes: Fails to repeat the message every 10 seconds if the problem persists

objective.overview: Check triggers(events) alignment + print message if not aligned repeat after 10 seconds
objective.notes: Fails to repeat the message every 10 seconds if the problem persists

objective.overview: FEDs stuck in ERROR/OOS/WARNING/BUSY(anything not READY)
objective.notes: where to check these states? frlcontrollerCard.substatus does not exist. "select distinct subState from frlcontrollerCard": yields only inactive, undefined, myrinet error, synch lost. myrinetState from frlcontrollerCard holds more hope though. "Stuck" in BUSY/WARNING ERROR just means fractionBusy etc = 1.0.

objective.overview: List FEDs with backpressure or deadtime
check if number of resyncs and the last resync event number is the same in all FEDs?
objective.notes: Check if the number of resyncs is the same and check if the last event (the resync was seen for) is the same. myrinetResync - number of resync events, myrinetLastResyncEvt - last event that the resync was seen for.
